Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject
Method.Implementation:
set proxy = ##super(params) set proxy.couple = ..Couple.ConvertToProxyObject()
set proxy.couple.man.dob = $ZD(..ManDOB, 3) set proxy.couple.woman.dob = $ZD(..WomanDOB, 3) set proxy.couple.otherInfo.city = ..City set proxy.couple.otherInfo.club = ..Club set proxy.couple.otherInfo.mainTrainer = ..MainTrainer set proxy.couple.otherInfo.otherTrainers = ..OtherTrainers
set proxy.couple.competitionsCount = "-" if (params.loadPrtObjCompetitionsCount) && $ISOBJECT(proxy.competition.tournament){ &sql(SELECT COUNT(Competition) INTO :proxy.couple.competitionsCount FROM Dance_Data.ParticipantCoupleWDSF WHERE Competition->Tournament = :proxy.competition.tournament.id AND Couple = :proxy.couple.id) }
quit proxy

Method.name: Create
Method.Implementation:
if ..CmpCplWDSFIdxExists(competition.%Id(), couple.id) { set obj = ..CmpCplWDSFIdxOpen(competition.%Id(), couple.id) set obj.IsActive = 1 set st = obj.%Save() quit obj }
set obj = ..%New() set obj.Recorder = recorder set obj.Couple = ##class(Dance.Data.CoupleWDSF).%OpenId(couple.id) set obj.Competition = competition set obj.ManDOB = $ZDH(couple.man.dob, 3) set obj.WomanDOB = $ZDH(couple.woman.dob, 3) set obj.City = couple.otherInfo.city set obj.Club = couple.otherInfo.club set obj.MainTrainer = couple.otherInfo.mainTrainer set obj.OtherTrainers = couple.otherInfo.otherTrainers set obj.PType = "CoupleWDSF" set st = obj.%Save() quit obj
